   303→## Phase 3: Create Daily Stack Generator
   304→
   305→### File: `src/lib/daily-stack.ts`
   306→
   307→Create a new file with the following content:
   308→
   309→```typescript
   310→/**
   311→ * Daily Stack Generator
   312→ * Generates universal supplement stack shown to ALL users
   313→ */
   314→
   315→import { DailyStack } from '@/types/results';
   316→import { getBaseStackProducts, getProductById } from './product_db';
   317→import { SUPPLEMENTS } from './recommendations/supplements';
   318→
   319→export function generateDailyStack(
   320→  gender: 'male' | 'female',
   321→  age?: number
   322→): DailyStack {
   323→  // Get base 6 products that everyone needs
   324→  let stackProducts = getBaseStackProducts();
   325→
   326→  // Add gender-specific boosters
   327→  if (gender === 'male') {
   328→    const ashwagandha = getProductById('ashwagandha_now');
   329→    if (ashwagandha) {
   330→      stackProducts = [...stackProducts, ashwagandha];
   331→    }
   332→  }
   333→
   334→  // Add age-specific boosters (30+)
   335→  if (age && age >= 30) {
   336→    const nmn = getProductById('nmn_prohealth');
   337→    if (nmn) {
   338→      stackProducts = [...stackProducts, nmn];
   339→    }
   340→  }
   341→
   342→  // Calculate total cost
   343→  const totalCostMin = stackProducts.reduce((sum, product) => {
   344→    const supplement = SUPPLEMENTS.find(s => s.id === product.supplementId);
   345→    return sum + (supplement?.costPerMonth.min || 0);
   346→  }, 0);
   347→
   348→  const totalCostMax = stackProducts.reduce((sum, product) => {
   349→    const supplement = SUPPLEMENTS.find(s => s.id === product.supplementId);
   350→    return sum + (supplement?.costPerMonth.max || 0);
   351→  }, 0);
   352→
   353→  // Organize by timing
   354→  const timing = {
   355→    morning: stackProducts.filter(p => {
   356→      const supplement = SUPPLEMENTS.find(s => s.id === p.supplementId);
   357→      return supplement?.timing.toLowerCase().includes('morning') ||
   358→             ['vitamin_c_now', 'd3_k2_sports_research', 'creatine_optimum', 'ashwagandha_now', 'nmn_prohealth'].includes(p.id);
   359→    }),
   360→    evening: stackProducts.filter(p => {
   361→      const supplement = SUPPLEMENTS.find(s => s.id === p.supplementId);
   362→      return supplement?.timing.toLowerCase().includes('evening') ||
   363→             supplement?.timing.toLowerCase().includes('bed') ||
   364→             ['magnesium_doctors_best', 'omega3_nordic'].includes(p.id);
   365→    }),
   366→    anytime: stackProducts.filter(p => {
   367→      const supplement = SUPPLEMENTS.find(s => s.id === p.supplementId);
   368→      const timing = supplement?.timing.toLowerCase() || '';
   369→      return timing.includes('any time') && !['magnesium_doctors_best', 'omega3_nordic'].includes(p.id);
   370→    }),
   371→  };
   372→
   373→  // Rationale message
   374→  const rationale = gender === 'male'
   375→    ? "This foundation stack supports skin elasticity, bone structure, hormonal balance, and inflammation control - the pillars of facial aesthetics and long-term appearance preservation."
   376→    : "This foundation stack supports collagen production, bone density, skin health, and hormonal balance - essential for maintaining facial aesthetics and preventing age-related changes.";
   377→
   378→  return {
   379→    products: stackProducts,
   380→    totalCostPerMonth: {
   381→      min: Math.round(totalCostMin),
   382→      max: Math.round(totalCostMax),
   383→    },
   384→    timing,
   385→    rationale,
   386→  };
   387→}
   388→
   389→// Helper to get supplement details for a product
   390→export function getSupplementDetails(supplementId: string) {
   391→  return SUPPLEMENTS.find(s => s.id === supplementId);
   392→}
   393→```

   472→
   473→#### Step 4.3: Add getProductRecommendations function (add after getRecommendations function)
   474→
   475→```typescript
   476→// ============================================
   477→// PRODUCT RECOMMENDATIONS
   478→// ============================================
   479→
   480→export function getProductRecommendations(
   481→  metricsDict: Record<string, number>,
   482→  severityDict: Record<string, string>,
   483→  gender: 'male' | 'female',
   484→  ethnicity: string
   485→): ProductRecommendation[] {
   486→  const recommendations: ProductRecommendation[] = [];
   487→  const seenProducts = new Set<string>();
   488→
   489→  // Iterate through all metrics
   490→  for (const [metricName, metricValue] of Object.entries(metricsDict)) {
   491→    const severity = severityDict[metricName];
   492→    if (!severity) continue;
   493→
   494→    // Determine state and urgency
   495→    let state: "flaw" | "ideal";
   496→    let urgency: "high" | "medium" | "low";
   497→    let messageTemplate: string;
   498→
   499→    if (severity === "severe" || severity === "extremely_severe") {
   500→      state = "flaw";
   501→      urgency = "high";
   502→      messageTemplate = "Your {metric} is WEAK (bottom 10%). Use {product} to IMPROVE it.";
   503→    } else if (severity === "moderate" || severity === "major") {
   504→      state = "flaw";
   505→      urgency = "medium";
   506→      messageTemplate = "Your {metric} needs improvement. Use {product} to optimize it.";
   507→    } else if (severity === "optimal" || severity === "ideal") {
   508→      state = "ideal";
   509→      urgency = "low";
   510→      messageTemplate = "Your {metric} is ELITE (top 10%). Use {product} to MAINTAIN and PROTECT this strength.";
   511→    } else {
   512→      continue; // Skip "minor" or "good" - not compelling enough
   513→    }
   514→
   515→    // Find products for this metric
   516→    let productIds = METRIC_TO_PRODUCTS[metricName];
   517→
   518→    // If no direct mapping, try category fallback
   519→    if (!productIds || productIds.length === 0) {
   520→      // Try to infer category from metric name
   521→      const metricLower = metricName.toLowerCase();
   522→      if (metricLower.includes('skin') || metricLower.includes('texture')) {
   523→        productIds = CATEGORY_TO_PRODUCTS['skin'];
   524→      } else if (metricLower.includes('jaw') || metricLower.includes('chin') || metricLower.includes('bone')) {
   525→        productIds = CATEGORY_TO_PRODUCTS['bone'];
   526→      } else if (metricLower.includes('hair')) {
   527→        productIds = CATEGORY_TO_PRODUCTS['hair'];
   528→      } else {
   529→        productIds = CATEGORY_TO_PRODUCTS['general'];
   530→      }
   531→    }
   532→
   533→    // Create recommendations for each product
   534→    for (const supplementId of productIds.slice(0, 2)) { // Max 2 products per metric
   535→      // Find product in PRODUCTS by supplementId
   536→      const product = PRODUCTS.find(p => p.supplementId === supplementId);
   537→      if (!product) continue;
   538→
   539→      // Skip if already recommended
   540→      if (seenProducts.has(product.id)) {
   541→        // Just add this metric to existing recommendation
   542→        const existing = recommendations.find(r => r.product.id === product.id);
   543→        if (existing && !existing.matchedMetrics.includes(metricName)) {
   544→          existing.matchedMetrics.push(metricName);
   545→        }
   546→        continue;
   547→      }
   548→
   549→      // Get supplement details for the product name
   550→      const supplement = SUPPLEMENTS.find(s => s.id === supplementId);
   551→      const productDisplayName = supplement?.name || product.name;
   552→
   553→      // Create personalized message
   554→      const message = messageTemplate
   555→        .replace('{metric}', metricName)
   556→        .replace('{product}', productDisplayName);
   557→
   558→      recommendations.push({
   559→        product,
   560→        state,
   561→        targetMetric: metricName,
   562→        message,
   563→        urgency,
   564→        matchedMetrics: [metricName],
   565→      });
   566→
   567→      seenProducts.add(product.id);
   568→    }
   569→  }
   570→
   571→  // Sort recommendations
   572→  // 1. High urgency flaws first
   573→  // 2. Then medium urgency flaws
   574→  // 3. Then ideal maintenance products
   575→  recommendations.sort((a, b) => {
   576→    const urgencyOrder = { high: 3, medium: 2, low: 1 };
   577→    const urgencyDiff = urgencyOrder[b.urgency] - urgencyOrder[a.urgency];
   578→    if (urgencyDiff !== 0) return urgencyDiff;
   579→
   580→    // Within same urgency, sort by product priority
   581→    return b.product.priority - a.product.priority;
   582→  });
   583→
   584→  // Return top 15 recommendations
   585→  return recommendations.slice(0, 15);
   586→}
   587→```

   788→        <div className="w-12 h-12 rounded-xl bg-white/20 flex items-center justify-center">
   789→          <Sparkles size={24} className="text-white" />
   790→        </div>
   791→        <div className="flex-1">
   792→          <h2 className="text-xl font-bold text-white">Your Foundation Stack</h2>
   793→          <p className="text-cyan-100 text-sm">
   794→            ${dailyStack.totalCostPerMonth.min}-${dailyStack.totalCostPerMonth.max}/month
   795→          </p>
   796→        </div>
   797→      </div>
   798→
   799→      {/* Rationale */}
   800→      <p className="text-white/90 text-sm mb-4 leading-relaxed">
   801→        {dailyStack.rationale}
   802→      </p>
   803→
   804→      {/* Product Pills */}
   805→      <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4">
   806→        {dailyStack.products.slice(0, 6).map(product => (
   807→          <div
   808→            key={product.id}
   809→            className="px-3 py-1.5 bg-white/20 rounded-full text-white text-sm font-medium"
   810→          >
   811→            {product.name}
   812→          </div>
   813→        ))}
   814→      </div>
   815→
   816→      {/* Expand/Collapse Button */}
   817→      <button
   818→        onClick={() => setIsExpanded(!isExpanded)}
   819→        className="w-full bg-white/20 hover:bg-white/30 text-white font-medium py-2.5 px-4 rounded-lg transition-colors flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
   820→      >
   821→        {isExpanded ? 'Hide Details' : 'View Complete Stack'}
   822→        {isExpanded ? <ChevronUp size={16} /> : <ChevronDown size={16} />}
   823→      </button>
   824→
   825→      {/* Expanded Details */}
   826→      <AnimatePresence>
   827→        {isExpanded && (
   828→          <motion.div
   829→            initial={{ height: 0, opacity: 0 }}
   830→            animate={{ height: 'auto', opacity: 1 }}
   831→            exit={{ height: 0, opacity: 0 }}
   832→            className="mt-4 space-y-4 overflow-hidden"
   833→          >
   834→            {/* Morning */}
   835→            {dailyStack.timing.morning.length > 0 && (
   836→              <div className="bg-white/10 rounded-xl p-4">
   837→                <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-white font-medium mb-3">
   838→                  <Sun size={18} />
   839→                  <span>Morning</span>
   840→                </div>
   841→                <div className="space-y-2">
   842→                  {dailyStack.timing.morning.map(product => {
   843→                    const supplement = getSupplementDetails(product.supplementId);
   844→                    return (
   845→                      <div key={product.id} className="flex items-center justify-between text-sm">
   846→                        <span className="text-white">{product.name}</span>
   847→                        <span className="text-cyan-100">{supplement?.dosage}</span>
   848→                      </div>
   849→                    );
   850→                  })}
   851→                </div>
   852→              </div>
   853→            )}
   854→
   855→            {/* Evening */}
   856→            {dailyStack.timing.evening.length > 0 && (
   857→              <div className="bg-white/10 rounded-xl p-4">
   858→                <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-white font-medium mb-3">
   859→                  <Moon size={18} />
   860→                  <span>Evening</span>
   861→                </div>
   862→                <div className="space-y-2">
   863→                  {dailyStack.timing.evening.map(product => {
   864→                    const supplement = getSupplementDetails(product.supplementId);
   865→                    return (
   866→                      <div key={product.id} className="flex items-center justify-between text-sm">
   867→                        <span className="text-white">{product.name}</span>
   868→                        <span className="text-cyan-100">{supplement?.dosage}</span>
   869→                      </div>
   870→                    );
   871→                  })}
   872→                </div>
   873→              </div>
   874→            )}
   875→
   876→            {/* Anytime */}
   877→            {dailyStack.timing.anytime.length > 0 && (
   878→              <div className="bg-white/10 rounded-xl p-4">
   879→                <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-white font-medium mb-3">
   880→                  <Clock size={18} />
   881→                  <span>Anytime</span>
   882→                </div>
   883→                <div className="space-y-2">
   884→                  {dailyStack.timing.anytime.map(product => {
   885→                    const supplement = getSupplementDetails(product.supplementId);
   886→                    return (
   887→                      <div key={product.id} className="flex items-center justify-between text-sm">
   888→                        <span className="text-white">{product.name}</span>
   889→                        <span className="text-cyan-100">{supplement?.dosage}</span>
   890→                      </div>
   891→                    );
   892→                  })}
   893→                </div>
   894→              </div>
   895→            )}
   896→          </motion.div>
   897→        )}
   898→      </AnimatePresence>
   899→    </motion.div>
   900→  );
   901→}
   902→```
   903→
   904→---
   905→
   906→## Phase 7: Update PlanTab to Integrate Products
   907→

   909→

export const SUPPLEMENTS: Supplement[] = [

  {
    id: 'collagen_peptides',
    name: 'Collagen Peptides (Hydrolyzed)',

    effectiveness: 7,
    evidenceLevel: 'moderate',
    costPerMonth: { min: 15, max: 40 },
    timelineToResults: '4-12 weeks',

      'Type I and III collagen most beneficial for skin',
      '2019 meta-analysis: significant improvement in skin elasticity and hydration',
      'Vitamin C enhances collagen synthesis - take together',
